title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.14 - Right of the course
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.14 - Right of the course

State Regulations

Horses called for a race shall have the exclusive right
of the course, and all other horses shall vacate the track at once, unless
permitted to remain by the judges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4117.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
